item.title: Brandolini's Bullshit Asymmetry Principle
item.description: The Principle Brandolini’s Bullshit Asymmetry Principle: The amount of energy needed to refute bullshit is an order of magnitude bigger than to produce it. [] Jonathan Swift: Falsehood flies, and the Truth comes limping after it; so that when Men come to be undeceiv’d, it is too late; the Jest is over, and the Tale has had its Effect… [] We’ve come so far with near-real time fact checking services. However, even with the same piece, they differ in what questions they fact check.
